text: ninnalkk ibrahimilum addehattinre kuteyullavarilum uttamamaya oru matrka untayittuntâ€Œ. avar tannalute janatayeat iprakaram paranna sandarbham: ninnalumayum allahuvin purame ninnal aradhikkunnavayumayulla bandhattil ninnu tirccayayum nannal olivayavarakunnu. ninnalil nannal avisvasiccirikkunnu. ninnal allahuvil matram visvasikkunnat vare ennennekkumayi nannalum ninnalum tam'mil satrutayum vidvesavum prakatamavukayum ceytirikkunnu. tirccayayum nan tankalkk venti papameacanam tetam, tankalkk venti allahuvinkal ninn yateannum enikk adhinappetuttanavilla enn ibrahim tanre pitavineat paranna vakkealike.
